name: 邱德威
objective: 探討有關無機物質的化學性質、原子結構及化學反應。討論在材料及礦物上之應用。
schedule:
ch1 What is Inorganic Chemistry
ch2 The Structure of the Atom
ch3 Symmetry and Group Theory
ch4 Bonding Model
ch5 Acid-Base Chemistry
ch6 Coordination Chemistry
ch7 Organometallic Chemistry
scorePolicy:
報告40%
期中考30%
期末考30%
materials: Inorganic Chemistry (J. E. Huheey, E. A. Keiter, R. L. Keiter)
